records.name: Holiday Mathiveri Inn, Maldives

descriptions.direction: Located in Mathiveri, this vacation home is near the beach. Folhudhoo Harbor and Ukulhas Harbor are local landmarks, and the area's natural beauty can be seen at Ari Atoll and Mathiveri Finolhu. Looking to get your feet wet? Jet skiing, kayaking and scuba diving adventures can be found near the property.
descriptions.general: Location A great place to have a rest after long walks around the city. Guest house «Holiday Mathiveri Inn Guest House» is located in Mathiveri. This guest house is located in the city center. Before going to bed, you can take a walk and enjoy the main landmarks of the city.At the guest house Spend an evening in a nice atmosphere of the bar. Taste the local cuisine and have a rest in the restaurant. Guests can choose between full board and half board. Free Wi-Fi on the territory will help you to stay on-line. Guests who love doing sports will be able to enjoy a fitness center and a diving club. The following services are available At the guest house for winter sports fans: a skiing area. You will find these entertainment amenities on the premises: entertainment, a picnic area and a barbeque area. There are playrooms for children at the guest house. They will be having so much fun that you might have to spend the evening with adults. Want to have an excursion? Consult the tour assistance desk of the guest house. For the free movement around the city, the guest house offers a transfer for you. Accessible for guests with disabilities: the elevator helps them to go to the highest floors. At the guests’ disposal, there’s also a laundry, dry cleaning, private check-in and check-out, ironing and a safe-deposit box. The staff of the guest house will be happy to talk to you in English and Italian.Room amenities In the room, there is an alarm clock, a shower, a TV and a mini-bar. The room equipment depends on its category.
